title: The godly maid of Leicester Being a true relation of Elizabeth Stretton, who lying upon her death-bed, was wonderfully delivered from the temptations of Satan: worthy the noting of all that would live and dye in the fear of God. The tune is, In summer time.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackery, and T. Passinger,
